trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Especifica o aspeto de um<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>propriedade para especificar as definições, tais como a cor, a largura, transparência e a forma da sugestão de caneta para <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>propriedade para especificar os atributos de desenho de traços adicionados a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only strokes that are added after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> undergo change show the updated attributes.
trans-unit.target: Apenas traços que são adicionados depois do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>são submetidos a alteração mostrar os atributos atualizados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the strokes that are already on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> does not change.
trans-unit.target: O aspeto de traços que já estão no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>não se altera.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DrawingAttributes class, see the DrawingAttributes constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe DrawingAttributes, consulte o construtor de DrawingAttributes.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta classe não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>|Black| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>|2 device independent pixels (DIP)| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>|2 DIP|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>| Negra | | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>|&2; pixels independentes dispositivo (DIP) | | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>|2 DIP|</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.Identity%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusTip?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A></xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma propriedade personalizada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The AddPropertyData method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O método AddPropertyData permite-lhe adicionar propriedades personalizadas para um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando os seus próprios traços de composição e pretender fornecer informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>para associar a propriedade personalizada.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types; however it cannot be an array of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`tem de ser do tipo <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>ou uma matriz destes dados tipos; no entanto não pode ser uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: propertyData is .
trans-unit.target: propertyDatais .

trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdestá vazio .

trans-unit.source: -or- propertyData is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: - ou - propertyData não é um dos tipos de dados permitido listados no secção.

trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object and populates it with the same values as the current object.
trans-unit.target: O método de clonagem cria uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>de objeto e preenche-lo com os mesmos valores que o objeto atual.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Any custom properties are also copied.
trans-unit.target: Também são copiadas a quaisquer propriedades personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cor de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified property data identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o identificador de dados de propriedade especificado está no <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o identificador de dados de propriedade especificado está a ser o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto é igual a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equals method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>objetos são iguais se as seguintes propriedades são iguais:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>> [!NOTE] > é igual ao método não verifica as propriedades personalizadas para igualdade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto para comparar a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os objetos são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Bezier smoothing is used to render the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se Bezier suavização é utilizado para compor o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use Bezier smoothing to render the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para utilizar Bezier suavização ao compor o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o atual <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade personalizada associado especificado <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetPropertyData method to access custom properties you added to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o método de GetPropertyData para aceder às propriedades personalizadas que adicionou a um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: GetPropertyData returns the default value for the built-in property if a value has not been set.
trans-unit.target: GetPropertyData devolve o valor predefinido para a propriedade incorporada, se não tiver sido definido um valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to get.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>associada com a propriedade personalizada a obter.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada associado especificado <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is not associated with a custom property of the object.
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdnão está associado uma propriedade personalizada do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUIDs of any custom properties associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os GUIDs de quaisquer propriedades personalizadas associadas a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GUIDs for the built-in properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class are in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> class.
trans-unit.target: Os GUIDs para as propriedades incorporadas de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>classe estão a ser da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Guid> that represents the property data identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.Guid>que representa os identificadores de dados de propriedade.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura de caneta utilizada para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Height property.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes fatores que afetam a altura e largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>quando é composto, mas não o valor da propriedade altura.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -A quantidade de pressão aplicada para a caneta quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>é desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Height property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade Height para 0 pixels independentes dispositivo (DIP), é alterado para 2 DIP.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates the height of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor que indica a altura de caneta utilizada para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Height property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Height é inferior a <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> ou <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes according the amount of pressure applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a espessura de um composto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> alterações de acordo com a quantidade de pressão aplicada.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of the stroke is uniform; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the thickness of a rendered <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> increases when pressure is increased.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a espessura do traço é uniform; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que a espessura de um composto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> aumenta quando for aumentada pressão.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> looks like a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> parece ser um highlighter.

trans-unit.source: When the IsHighlighter property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is slightly transparent, which allows the strokes underneath to appear.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade IsHighlighter está definida como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>é ligeiramente transparente, que permite que os traços sob a aparecer.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> as a highlighter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para compor o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> como um highlighter; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest value allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o maior valor permitido para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxHeight field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de MaxHeight para verificar se é um valor dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Opte por fazê-lo quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, tais como a intervenção do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Use the MinHeight field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de MinHeight para verificar se é um valor dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Opte por fazê-lo quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, tais como a intervenção do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest value allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o menor valor permitido para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width*>

trans-unit.source: Use the MinWidth field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o campo de MinWidth para verificar se é um valor dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Opte por fazê-lo quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, tais como a intervenção do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: The OnAttributeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnAttributeChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: e is .
trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> alterações de propriedade.

trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyDataChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPropertyDataChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a técnica preferencial para processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.target: eis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objetos são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Equality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>objetos são iguais se as seguintes propriedades são iguais:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>> [!NOTE] > método de igualdade o não verifica as propriedades personalizadas para igualdade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os objetos são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objetos não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are not equal if the following properties are not equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> > [!NOTE] > The Inequality method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>Objetos não são iguais se as seguintes propriedades não são iguais:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>> [!NOTE] > método Inequality o não verifica as propriedades personalizadas para igualdade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objeto para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os objetos não são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when property data is added or removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os dados de propriedade são adicionados ou removidos a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a propriedade personalizada associada especificado <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>associada com a propriedade personalizada para remover.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is not associated with a custom property of the object.
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdnão está associado uma propriedade personalizada do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a forma de caneta utilizada para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> que especifica a transformação executar na sugestão dos caneta.

trans-unit.source: Use the StylusTipTransform property to rotate, skew, or scale the stylus tip.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de StylusTipTransform para rodar, prejudicar ou aumentar a sugestão de caneta.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> que especifica a transformação executar na sugestão dos caneta.

trans-unit.source: The matrix set to StylusTipTransform is not an invertible matrix.
trans-unit.target: A matriz definida como StylusTipTransform não é uma matriz pode ser invertida.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY*> property of the matrix is not zero.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <> </> *> ou <> </> *> propriedade de matriz não é zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura de caneta utilizada para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the Width property.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes fatores que afetam a altura e largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>quando é composto, mas não o valor da propriedade largura.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -A quantidade de pressão aplicada para a caneta quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>é desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Width property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade Width para 0 pixels independentes dispositivo (DIP), é alterado para 2 DIP.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML que esta propriedade não é normalmente utilizada em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura de caneta utilizada para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Width property is less than <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Width é inferior a <xref:System.Double.Epsilon?displayProperty=fullName> ou <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
